forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 55. East southeast wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 44. East southeast wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8am, then rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. South wind 12 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 37 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
